macro: Regime remains selective risk-on: structural AI/defense demand is intact, but long-end yield volatility keeps valuation pressure on weaker long-duration equities.
policy: Cross-border AI controls and defense procurement urgency are still key transmission channels; policy beta remains elevated across semis, mission software, and strategic manufacturing.
delta: Compared with prior run, stance is unchanged directionally but tighter on risk budgeting: emphasize cash-flow durability, reduce narrative-only exposure, and require cross-asset confirmation before adding beta.
